item.description:
Dear Boston Volunteers,

Lets welcome the new organization,"The Sightings" to our BV Family. The Sightings organizes Santa Claus 5k run every year at New Bedford, MA for Charity (Southcoast Hospitals Cardiac Programs). We had a blast at this event last year.

See the 2011 aerial view of the event below:

We are looking for 15 Volunteers for Friday , Dec 7, 2012 for passing out numbers and Santa suits and also set up the gym for registration. Also, 30 volunteers for Saturday, Dec 8, 2012 for Registration and setting up cones on course. If you volunteer to drive and like to give a ride to other volunteers, that would be very helpful-please let me know in the questionnaire. If you dont have a car and if you are still interested to be part of the event, please RSVP, we will coordinate to make sure you get a ride.

Please check their website for more information:

http://www.thesightings.com/about/

Last year I did this 5k run, I had a blast, here is the picture:

 

Thanks

Phani

The Boston Volunteers

Big Enough to Deliver, Small Enough to Care
Learn more: www.BostonVolunteer.org

Please friend Boston Volunteers Mascot- Paulette: http://on.fb.me/Of9QbB

Connect with your fellow Boston Volunteers
http://www.facebook.com/BostonVolunteers
Discover exclusive Boston Volunteer opportunities:
https://twitter.com/#!/BostonVolunteer

P.S. Please check out new Boston Volunteers T-shirts.

group.name: Boston Volunteers. Big enough 2 deliver, small enough 2 care

item.name: Volunteer at the Santa Sightings 5K run (Lets Carpool to New Bedford)
